author: Special Correspondent
text: M. Anbukani and P. Srinivasavaradhan have been elected chairman and vice-chairman respectively of Confederation of Indian Industry, Madurai zone. Mr. Anbukani is MD of Penguin Apparels, a full-service readymade garment manufacturing unit, and Mr. Srinivasavaradhan is president, TVS Srichakra Tyres. , according to a CII release.
title: CII office-bearers
